sentences.en: An audio - visual display gives visitors an idea of what life was like aboard a sailing ship.
sentences.cn: 视听展览让参观者得以了解在航行中的船上生活是什么样子.

sentences.en: As with visual feedback, computer games tend to excel at positive audio feedback.
sentences.cn: 和视觉反馈一样, 计算机游戏擅长于正面听觉反馈.

sentences.en: Audio signals can be transmitted along cables without distortion.
sentences.cn: 声音信号可以通过电缆传送而不失真。

sentences.en: DVD - Audio adopts Meridian Lossless Packing scheme ( MLP ).
sentences.cn: DVD-Audio采用无损压缩编码 ( MLP ) 方案.

sentences.en: Its frequency response has to be flat over the whole audio range.
sentences.cn: 它的频率响应在整个音频范围内有所下降.

sentences.en: Often, the meeting is recorded on audio or video media for later reference.
sentences.cn: 通常这种会议会以视频或者音频形式记录下来,供以后查阅.

sentences.en: Press the setup button to display the setup menu, and move the highlight down to audio.
sentences.cn: 按Setup键显示Setup菜单, 然后移动亮条到Audio选项上.

sentences.en: She uses her vocal training to record audio tapes of books for blind people.
sentences.cn: 她利用接受的声乐训练给盲人录制磁带图书。

sentences.en: The school's audio apparatus includes films and records.
sentences.cn: 学校的视听设备包括放映机和录音机.

sentences.en: They hailed the advances audio has made.
sentences.cn: 他们欢呼在音频方面所取得的进步.

sentences.en: Users can download MP3 music files and record them directly onto a CD audio disc using a PC CD writer.
sentences.cn: 用户可以下载MP3音乐文件，然后用个人电脑上的光盘刻录机直接刻写在CD音乐光盘上。

sentences.en: Visitors are shown an audio-visual presen-tation before touring the cellars.
sentences.cn: 参观酒窖前，游客们先观看了有声的视频介绍。

sentences.en: We digitize all the audio, including the radio calls.
sentences.cn: 我们分析了所有音频, 包括无线呼叫.

phrases.tran_cn: 音频系统；话音系统；声音系统

trans.tran_en: relating to sound that is recorded or broadcast

trans.tran_cn: 音频，音响，声音回路，声音信号
